decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The extension hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary or incidental, or both, to the residential use of the dwelling house currently known as '4 Arnold Drive, Chessington, KT9 2GD', as set out in Section 1 (Site Address) of the submitted application form signed 10.05.2022, unless otherwise first agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: The extension would not be appropriate as a separate unit of accommodation and, were such a use to occur, this could adversely impact the character and appearance of the area and neighbouring amenity, contrary to Policy DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012)
description: Erection of single storey outbuilding garden room attached to existing garage
